item.title: Yo Elrick
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:14, topic:545170”][quote author=Newty link=topic=664049.msg4438917#msg4438917 date=1405911059]

mfw newty and newtys pure are both online

tl;dr newty is hacker

hahaha world 8 meant offline in the old servers!

Single best thread in the past like 5 years. I miss the good old days… That server was one of the best. I wish Bezza had stuck around. I remember leading both KFN’s and Lasagne’s moderator applications. Both of those guys were great. And the fact that white armour was the best armour in game and required 99s to use it was the best XD.

Bezza actually visits rserver from time to time. Stuie is there also (stumeo) as well as Afro and a few other players. Wasn’t there a portal that took you to an island to fight white knights?

Also, runecrafting was awesome in PkIsle. Only 1 altar and it was in the wild. Every 10 levels you made 2x more runes. I really want to host a just for fun server based around that.

Yeah white portal took you to some white knight island.

Tbh when you get some free time you should look at the code, add whatever is necessary, and then host it as an actual server. That or take the most stable base and then recode it as a replica. Entrana was the best home ever.

The source actually doesn’t exist on the internet any more as far as I can tell. I’ve looked high and low all over the place for it

I had a copy in my yahoo email that was from the beginning when I hosted it. I logged in to download it the other day only to find out that my email address had been permanently deleted for inactivity… What type of fudgeing shit site would delete a users email permanently… :’(

Well anyway, I’m in the process of collecting information about the server right now so I can replicate it as close to perfect as possible. Here’s what I’ve found so far

http://imgur.com/a/8otye
[/quote]
Yesyesyes! That white island was where white knights were. You needed at least one 99 melee combat. Did not remember there being that many shops. Not sure if you have your old Skype still, but if you ever want help trying to make it an actual server, you know I’m in.[/quote]
For what it’s worth, the server does look incredibly fun. If you needed or wanted me, you could have me too, Mr Chapman.

Read full topic

Single best thread in the past like 5 years. I miss the good old days… That server was one of the best. I wish Bezza had stuck around. I remember leading both KFN’s and Lasagne’s moderator applications. Both of those guys were great. And the fact that white armour was the best armour in game and required 99s to use it was the best XD.

Bezza actually visits rserver from time to time. Stuie is there also (stumeo) as well as Afro and a few other players. Wasn’t there a portal that took you to an island to fight white knights?

Also, runecrafting was awesome in PkIsle. Only 1 altar and it was in the wild. Every 10 levels you made 2x more runes. I really want to host a just for fun server based around that.

Yeah white portal took you to some white knight island.

Tbh when you get some free time you should look at the code, add whatever is necessary, and then host it as an actual server. That or take the most stable base and then recode it as a replica. Entrana was the best home ever.
[/quote]

The source actually doesn’t exist on the internet any more as far as I can tell. I’ve looked high and low all over the place for it

I had a copy in my yahoo email that was from the beginning when I hosted it. I logged in to download it the other day only to find out that my email address had been permanently deleted for inactivity… What type of fudgeing shit site would delete a users email permanently… :’(

Well anyway, I’m in the process of collecting information about the server right now so I can replicate it as close to perfect as possible. Here’s what I’ve found so far

http://imgur.com/a/8otye[/quote]
Yesyesyes! That white island was where white knights were. You needed at least one 99 melee combat. Did not remember there being that many shops. Not sure if you have your old Skype still, but if you ever want help trying to make it an actual server, you know I’m in.

Single best thread in the past like 5 years. I miss the good old days… That server was one of the best. I wish Bezza had stuck around. I remember leading both KFN’s and Lasagne’s moderator applications. Both of those guys were great. And the fact that white armour was the best armour in game and required 99s to use it was the best XD.

Bezza actually visits rserver from time to time. Stuie is there also (stumeo) as well as Afro and a few other players. Wasn’t there a portal that took you to an island to fight white knights?

item.title: Yo Elrick
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:5, topic:545170”]mfw newty and newtys pure are both online

tl;dr newty is hacker[/quote]

hahaha world 8 meant offline in the old servers!

Elrick:

Single best thread in the past like 5 years. I miss the good old days… That server was one of the best. I wish Bezza had stuck around. I remember leading both KFN’s and Lasagne’s moderator applications. Both of those guys were great. And the fact that white armour was the best armour in game and required 99s to use it was the best XD.

Bezza actually visits rserver from time to time. Stuie is there also (stumeo) as well as Afro and a few other players. Wasn’t there a portal that took you to an island to fight white knights?

Also, runecrafting was awesome in PkIsle. Only 1 altar and it was in the wild. Every 10 levels you made 2x more runes. I really want to host a just for fun server based around that.

Read full topic
